alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Wrangell; Petersburg Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:37PM AKST until January 23 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the northern panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Kake and along the outer coast to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter but remaining cold enough to stay as snow. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...Petersburg Borough and City and Borough of Wrangell. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will warm through the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Wrangell; Petersburg Borough
